long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
IGComents extract Instagram comments including emails & phone numbers, Export to CSV with one click.
An IG Follower Export Tool to Extract Instagram comments and export to CSV.
IGComments - IG Comments Export Tool, automatically scrapes user profiles from Instagram post comments and exports them to CSV files.

1Ô∏è‚É£ Feature
‚úÖ Export comments from Instagram to csv
‚úÖ Extract user profile, including follower and following count, posts count, public Email, public phone number and external URL, etc.
‚úÖ Save extracted data to local storage, download data anytime and support to continue extract anytime.

2Ô∏è‚É£ How to get started?
(1) Enter a link to an Instagram post
(Select Include email in Setting if you want to export email, and increase Random Interval between the requests to decrease risk, e.g.12s)
(2)On the Settings page, set your preferences, such as request interval
(3) Click the Export Button
(4) Click to export to CSV when the data extract completes.

long.en,en_AU:
CommentExporter is an innovative browser plugin that revolutionizes your Instagram experience. With this powerful tool, you can effortlessly export user information, including publicly available email addresses and phone numbers, of Instagram users who have commented on any post. Whether it's your own posts or posts from other users, CommentExporter allows you to extract valuable data and gain insights into your Instagram community. With one-click export to CSV (Comma-Separated Values) files and the ability to continue tasks from your task history, CommentExporter is the ultimate solution for efficient data management and seamless workflow.

CommentExporter extract Instagram comments including emails & phone numbers, Export to CSV with one click.

An IG Follower Export Tool to Extract Instagram comments and export to CSV.
IGComments - IG Comments Export Tool, automatically scrapes user profiles from Instagram post comments and exports them to CSV files.

# New Feature
üéâ Support advanced filtering queries

1Ô∏è‚É£ Feature
‚úÖ Export comments from Instagram to csv
‚úÖ Extract user profile, including follower and following count, posts count, public Email, public phone number and external URL, etc.
‚úÖ Save extracted data to local storage, download data anytime and support to continue extract anytime.

Advanced User Information Export: CommentExporter empowers you to extract detailed user information from Instagram comments. Effortlessly export user data such as email addresses, phone numbers, and more from comments on any post, providing you with valuable insights to enhance your engagement strategies and build meaningful connections.

CSV Export Capability: With a simple click, CommentExporter enables you to export the extracted user information to CSV files. Seamlessly manage and analyze your data, integrate it with other tools, and streamline your workflows for efficient marketing, research, and outreach.

Task Continuation from History: Never lose track of your progress again. CommentExporter allows you to continue tasks from your task history, ensuring uninterrupted workflow and productivity. Easily retrieve completed or archived tasks and seamlessly pick up where you left off.

User-Friendly Interface: CommentExporter features a user-friendly interface that seamlessly integrates into your browser. Navigate effortlessly through its powerful features, export user information, manage tasks, and optimize your Instagram experience with ease.

Privacy and Compliance: CommentExporter respects user privacy and operates within the boundaries set by Instagram's terms and conditions. It strictly adheres to ethical practices, ensuring that only publicly available information is extracted and maintaining the privacy and security of user data.

Take your Instagram data analysis and task management to new heights with CommentExporter. Download the plugin today and unlock the power of comprehensive user data extraction, seamless task continuation, and streamlined productivity. Simplify data management, enhance your Instagram strategies, and maximize your growth potential with CommentExporter.

2Ô∏è‚É£ How to get started?
(1) Enter a link to an Instagram post
(Select Include email in Setting if you want to export email, and increase Random Interval between the requests to decrease risk, e.g.12s)
(2)On the Settings page, set your preferences, such as request interval
(3) Click the Export Button
(4) Click to export to CSV when the data extract completes.


3Ô∏è‚É£ FAQ
If you have any problems, don't hesitate to contact us at pingappsteam@tailang.top

4Ô∏è‚É£ Data Privacy
All the data you process is on your local computer and never passes through our servers.
